member.name: P:SimpleImageUpload_UserControl_WebApp_VB.SimpleImageUpload.PopupPictureTrimmerSettingsProvider.AllowResize
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether users can resize the source image through the GUI.

member.name: P:SimpleImageUpload_UserControl_WebApp_VB.SimpleImageUpload.PopupPictureTrimmerSettingsProvider.AutoFreezeOnFormSubmit
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control has to automatically freeze the GUI when the form is submitted.

member.name: P:SimpleImageUpload_UserControl_WebApp_VB.SimpleImageUpload.PopupPictureTrimmerSettingsProvider.AutoZoomMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating how the PictureTrimmer instance automatically calculates the ZoomFactor.

member.name: P:SimpleImageUpload_UserControl_WebApp_VB.SimpleImageUpload.PopupPictureTrimmerSettingsProvider.BackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the BackColor property of the PictureTrimmer control.

member.name: P:SimpleImageUpload_UserControl_WebApp_VB.SimpleImageUpload.PopupPictureTrimmerSettingsProvider.CancelButtonText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text of the "Cancel button".

member.name: P:SimpleImageUpload_UserControl_WebApp_VB.SimpleImageUpload.PopupPictureTrimmerSettingsProvider.CropShadowMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating how the PictureTrimmer GUI renders the cropping mask.

member.name: P:SimpleImageUpload_UserControl_WebApp_VB.SimpleImageUpload.PopupPictureTrimmerSettingsProvider.EnableAutoCenterView
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control has to automatically center the view after the user drags the crop area outside the visible area.

member.name: P:SimpleImageUpload_UserControl_WebApp_VB.SimpleImageUpload.PopupPictureTrimmerSettingsProvider.EnableSnapping
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the crop area automatically snaps to the edge or the center of the image when the user moves the rectangle near those positions.

member.name: P:SimpleImageUpload_UserControl_WebApp_VB.SimpleImageUpload.PopupPictureTrimmerSettingsProvider.FlashWMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the Window Mode property of the Adobe Flash movie for transparency, layering, and positioning in the browser (it is strongly suggested to use the FlashWMode.Window setting).

member.name: P:SimpleImageUpload_UserControl_WebApp_VB.SimpleImageUpload.PopupPictureTrimmerSettingsProvider.ForeColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the foreground color.

member.name: P:SimpleImageUpload_UserControl_WebApp_VB.SimpleImageUpload.PopupPictureTrimmerSettingsProvider.LightBoxCssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the Cascading Style Sheet (CSS) class used to customize the style of the LightBox popup window.

member.name: P:SimpleImageUpload_UserControl_WebApp_VB.SimpleImageUpload.PopupPictureTrimmerSettingsProvider.SaveButtonText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text of the "Save button".

member.name: P:SimpleImageUpload_UserControl_WebApp_VB.SimpleImageUpload.PopupPictureTrimmerSettingsProvider.ShowCancelButton
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display the "Cancel button" in the popup window.

member.name: P:SimpleImageUpload_UserControl_WebApp_VB.SimpleImageUpload.PopupPictureTrimmerSettingsProvider.ShowCropAlignmentLines
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show lines that facilitate the alignment of the crop rectangle.

member.name: P:SimpleImageUpload_UserControl_WebApp_VB.SimpleImageUpload.PopupPictureTrimmerSettingsProvider.ShowDetailsPanel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show the "Details panel" in the component GUI.

member.name: P:SimpleImageUpload_UserControl_WebApp_VB.SimpleImageUpload.PopupPictureTrimmerSettingsProvider.ShowFlipPanel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show the flip control in the "Rotate/Flip panel". The flip control allows the user to flip the image horizontally and/or vertically.

member.name: P:SimpleImageUpload_UserControl_WebApp_VB.SimpleImageUpload.PopupPictureTrimmerSettingsProvider.ShowImageAdjustmentsPanel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show the "Adjustments panel" in the component GUI. The "Adjustments panel" allows the user to change Brightness, Contrast, Hue and/or Saturation of the Image.

member.name: P:SimpleImageUpload_UserControl_WebApp_VB.SimpleImageUpload.PopupPictureTrimmerSettingsProvider.ShowResizePanel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show the "Resize panel" in the component GUI. The "Resize panel" allows the user to change the ResizeFactor applied to the source Image.

member.name: P:SimpleImageUpload_UserControl_WebApp_VB.SimpleImageUpload.PopupPictureTrimmerSettingsProvider.ShowRotatePanel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show the rotate control in the "Rotate/Flip panel". The rotate control allows the user to rotate the image clockwise by 0, 90, 180 or 270 degrees.

member.name: P:SimpleImageUpload_UserControl_WebApp_VB.SimpleImageUpload.PopupPictureTrimmerSettingsProvider.ShowRulers
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show the rulers at the left and at the top of the working area.

member.name: P:SimpleImageUpload_UserControl_WebApp_VB.SimpleImageUpload.PopupPictureTrimmerSettingsProvider.ShowZoomPanel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show the "Zoom panel" in the component GUI. The "Zoom panel" allows the user to magnify an area of the image. Please note that ZoomPanel is always invisible when the crop feature is disabled (CropConstraint = null).

member.name: T:SimpleImageUpload_UserControl_WebApp_VB.SimpleImageUpload.PopupPictureTrimmerSettingsProvider
member.summary: Provides access to settings of a PopupPictureTrimmer instance.
